Title: The new silicon valley (literally)
Description:
Arizona's economy was once dominated by the "five C's": cotton, cattle, citrus, copper, and climate.
But a new C has emerged that could grow to overshadow the rest: chips.
New semiconductor manufacturing facilities are springing up across the greater Phoenix …

Title: I used GameSir's latest budget mobile controller, and it has a lightweight design with hall effect joysticks, all at just $27
Description:
GameSir's X5 Lite is a budget mobile gaming controller that lets you game anywhere.
And right now, it's an even better value.

Title: Russian hacking suspect wanted by the FBI arrested on Thai resort island
Description:
Thai Police have arrested a suspected Russian hacker who is wanted by the FBI for alleged cyberattacks on U.S.
and European government agencies.

Title: Jay Leno reveals the one thing that's been hardest since his wife's dementia diagnosis
Description: Jay Leno says his wife still expresses her love for him: "And when she looks at me and smiles, and says she loves me, I mean, I melt."

Title: Feeling way busier at work this year? An EY survey of 15,000 workers shows you're not alone.
Description: EY's survey of workers in 29 countries found that 64% of employees think their workload has increased in the last twelve months.

Title: 8 celebrities who competed at Miss Universe before they became famous
Description: The Miss Universe stage has propelled many women to fame, including influencer Olivia Culpo, actor Gal Gadot, and reality TV star Kenya Moore.

Title: Sonder had years of red flags before Marriott made a deal — and travelers got left in the lurch
Description:
Sonder wanted to revolutionize the way people stay.
It ended up leaving guests with nowhere to go.

Title: Dev Hynes Returns as Blood Orange
Description: Also: the kamancheh playing of Kayhan Kalhor, Ethan Lipton’s surrealist “The Seat of Our Pants,” our writers’ holiday traditions, and more.

Title: Nursing Excluded as 'Professional' Degree by Department of Education
Description: The Trump administration's "One Big Beautiful Bill" excludes nursing from graduate degree programs deemed as 'professional.' The move impacts loan funding, healthcare delivery, and patient care access.

Title: The Qtile Window Manager: A Python-Powered Tiling Experience
Description: My journey from XFCE to Qtile, a tiling window manager written entirely in Python, including setup, configuration strategies, and real-world config examples.

Description:
